indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1. Progress towards completion of Integrated Water Resource Management Systems in HA. Ihavandhoo, ADh. Mahibadhoo and GDh. Gadhdhoo 2. Number of staff from water and sewage utility companies trained in the technical principles and skills required to design, implement and maintain climate-resilient and integrated water management systems. 3. % of people living on HA. Ihavandhoo, ADh. Mahibadhoo, and GDh. Gadhdhoo who have uninterrupted access to reliable and safe freshwater supply in extreme climatic conditions

baseline.comment: 1. No Integrated Water Resource Management Systems in HA. Ihavandhoo, ADh. Mahibadhoo and GDh. Gadhdhoo 2. 0 3. 0%

target.comment: 1. Completion of designs of most appropriate Integrated Water Resource Management (IWRM) systems for the 3 islands and at least 70% completion of implementation. 2. 5 3. 50%

actual.comment: 1. Design of Integrated Water Resource Management Systems completed in the islands of Mahibadhoo, Gadhdoo and Ihavandhoo. Designs implementation has started with Reverse Osmosis plants being installed in all islands 2. 17 3. 0%

target.comment: 1. Integrated Water Resource Management Systems completed and handover to Utilities companies in Ihavandhoo, Mahibadhoo, and Gadhdhoo 2. 0 3. 100%

iati-activity.title: Low Emission Climate Resilient Development
iati-activity.description: The programme will assist the Laamu Atoll and its islands to realize low emission and climate resilient development (LECReD). The programme seeks to mainstream LECReD issues into local level development planning

iati-activity.title: Low Emission Climate Resilient
iati-activity.description: Project to support low emission climate resilient local development in Maldives. It will achieve this by taking an atoll-based approach, focusing on Laamu Atoll
